name: Sadat Ahmed-Khan
story: Sami Spanta grew up in a small village in Afghanistan. He was always interested in the military and dreamed of being a soldier one day. After finishing his education, he joined the army and became an expert in using automatic rifles. He was recruited by the OPFOR faction due to his excellent skills and has been serving as a Private in their forces ever since. Despite the dangers of war, he remains courageous and determined to defend his country.
